title: Episode 734 - Special Guest Chad Prather

itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by The Blaze’s Chad Prather to talk about Chad running for Governor of Texas, Big Tech censorship and what we can do about it, Parler vs. Twitter, what Chad would do as governor, voting requirements, and Chad’s ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by The Blaze’s Chad Prather to talk about Chad running for Governor of Texas, Big Tech censorship and what we can do about it, Parler vs. Twitter, what Chad would do as governor, voting requirements, and Chad’s thoughts on 2020 election fraud.
